item.description:
UPDATE--like last time, AT 7 PM THE PLAN IS FOR those interested to scout out LEGAL SEAFOODS OUTDOOR BAR & PATIO nearby, since the forecast for then is decent. Join up then if you like.

Grendels has an amazing half-price food menu daily from 5-7:30, (with the purchase of a minimum $3 beverage)! Half-price menu includes appetizers. Try not to come past 5:30, seating is limited!

Harvard Square, the heart of intellectual razzmatazz, has already successfully hosted (every other Sunday) three Intellectual Snob Meetups with the unrepentant Nerd Fun Meetup! Some fellow nerds have even showed up with fake moustaches, glasses with fold-up sun flaps, and corduroy jackets with elbow patches.

You don't have to be a genuine intellectual. "Pseudo-intellectuals" are also welcome to fake it! (See: "how to become a pseudo intellectual" on ehow.com). Just bring your baffling, aloof opinions and a "stiff upper lip".

For a test as to whether or not you "qualify" as an intellectual snob, we recommend the audacious Okcupid Intellectual Snob Test for a fun and innocent introduction (you don't need to log in).

Snobs always know, or think they know something deeply meaningful that nobody else knows. (See: The Society for the Collection of Obscure Facts on Facebook for examples!)
So enlighten your fellow snobs: as in the last Meetup, name tags will be passed around; those interested in confounding others with a question or two, scribble it on their tag(s).

Although street parking in Harvard Square on Sundays is "unrestricted", public transportation is recommended (parking space is limited).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a Nerd Fun sign near a row of tables
item.name: Intellectual Snob Solidarity Meetup (GRENDEL'S)
